remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow2b .  Left multiplication in a subgroup ` H ` is a group action on the set of all left cosets of ` K ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow2b.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow2b.xf $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow2b.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
sylow2b.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
sylow2b.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow2b.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG K ) $.
sylow2b.m $e |- .x. = ( x e. H , y e. ( X /. .~ ) |-> ran ( z e. y |-> ( x .+ z ) ) ) $.
sylow2blem2 $p |- ( ph -> .x. e. ( ( G |`s H ) GrpAct ( X /. .~ ) ) ) $.
